avdta.network.node

Class TurningMovement

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractSet<E>
        • java.util.HashSet<ConflictRegion>
          • avdta.network.node.TurningMovement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<ConflictRegion>, java.util.Collection<ConflictRegion>, java.util.Set<ConflictRegion>

    public class TurningMovement
extends java.util.HashSet<ConflictRegion>
    This is a representation of a turning movement that passes through one or more ConflictRegions. Therefore, it extends a HashSet of ConflictRegions, and adds several utility methods.
    See Also:
